product_name: The North Face Mini Base Camp Free Fall Pack - Kids'
long_description: Sized just for kids, The North Face Mini Base Camp Free Fall pack is ruggedly built to withstand the abuse only a kid can dish out. Youth-specific shoulder straps feature a sternum strap to keep the pack close; stitched-foam back panel supplies comfort. Water- and abrasion-resistant polyester and nylon material with PVC-free thermoplastic elastomer coating withstands abuse. Generous main compartment is sized to fit books or trail essentials. Front zippered organizer compartment has 2 pockets-1 is designed to store and protect an electronic gadget. Front features a 3-loop daisy chain for lashing on gear. The North Face Mini Base Camp Fee Fall pack features a reflective light loop patch (light sold separately).
short_description: Sized just for kids, The North Face Mini Base Camp Free Fall pack is ruggedly built to withstand the abuse only a kid can dish out.
